channel.title: About the Modules category
channel.description:
Rebol2 was developed for small scripts, and didn't have any concept of "module isolation".
R3-Alpha had the somewhat ambitious idea of implementing a module import and export system entirely in usermode code. The [design was unfinished](http://rebol.com/r3/docs/concepts/modules.html), hampered somewhat by the incomplete binding model.
Ren-C continues in pursuit of the goal of a userspace module system, leveraging a better binding model.
